articles.description: It looks like it'll only get better for Liverpool from here, but for Newcastle United it has to get worse because of the mess Nick Pope made.
articles.content: NEWCASTLE, England -- Liverpool blew the race for Champions League qualification wide open by cruising to a 2-0 win at Newcastle on a day when the home side played with ten men for 68 minutes followi… [+11089 chars]

articles.title: Lionel Messi wanted 6 people out of Barcelona including player who betrayed his father if he were to remain at Camp Nou: Reports - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Before leaving for Paris Saint-Germain (PSG), Lionel Messi and his father Jorge - who also acted as his agent - gave an ultimatum to Barcelona president Joan Laporta.

articles.title: Barcelona confirm huge injury boost ahead of Europa League second leg vs Manchester United - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Barcelona are set to have Sergio Busquets back available for Thursday's clash with Man United at Old Trafford.
articles.content:
Barcelona head coach Xavi has confirmed that midfielder Sergio Busquets will be available for Thursday's Europa League knockout round second leg against Manchester United at Old Trafford.
